2 6,588 45,827 42,409 77,976 67,961 Sep 18,268 15,617 5,431 3,379 33,685 30,397 57,384 49,393 Oct 19,082 17,058 3,633 1,800 29,881 27,132 52,596 45,990 Nov 17,003 15,245 5,176 3,224 30,120 27,871 52,299 46,340 Dec Total 1944 210,544 170,117 18,252 16,424 7,350 4,881 35,487 33,242 61,089 54,547 79,461 54,922 365,284 334,578 655,289 559,617 1945 Jan 16,702 14,750 4,457 2,998 26,418 24,561 47,577 42,309 Feb 22,884 19,933 9,255 7,902 36,226 34,515 68,365 62,350 Mar 31,169 28,804 17,461 15,792 62,842 60,199 111,472 104,795 Apr 20,514 18,180 10,832 May 2,276 2,254 Total 1945 93,545 83,921 9,209 48,056 45,453 79,402 72,842 278 42,283 167 36,068 2,557 3,011 5,565 4,978 176,553 167,285 312,381 287,274 Grand Total 332,904 274,921 131,051 96,523 570,097 527,314 1,034,052 898,758   ## p. 638 (#662) ############################################    ## p. 639 (#663) ############################################  Appendix 14 Combat Sorties Flown in the Mediterranean Theater of Operations June 1942 to May 1945 Heavy Bomber Med/Lt Bomber Fighter Total Airborne Effective* Airborne Effective* Airborne Effective* Airborne Effective* 1942 Jun 70 70 Jul 166 166 Aug 180 71 4 255 Sep 217 73 286 576 Oct 280 299 940 1,519 Nov 513 351 1,680 2,544 Dec 482 244 1,440 2,166 Total 1942 1,908 1,038 4,350 7,296 1943 Jan 739 622 891 771 2,700 2,452 4,330 3,845 Feb 734 585 607 503 2,021 1,755 3,362 2,843 Mar 835 720 1,134 931 4,509 4,079 6,478 5,730 Apr 1,586 1,359 2,404 2,089 8,973 8,372 12,963 11,820 May 2,152 1,890 2,283 2,099 8,289 7,653 12,724 11,642 Jun 2,065 1,944 2,656 2,476 8,527 7,974 13,248 12,394 Jul 3,242 2,860 4,784 4,579 16,344 15,660 24,370 23,099 Aug 2,298 2,097 4,563 4,337 14,671 14,074 21,532 20,508 Sep 2,909 2,339 5,429 5,011 12,321 11,771 20,659 19,121 Oct 2,005 1,427 3,259 2,791 8,860 8,146 14,124 12,364 Nov 1,785 1,069 3,358 2,633 10,713 9,717 15,856 13,419 Dec 2,039 1,606 3,644 2,986 14,265 13,041 19,948 17,633 Total 1943 22,389 18,518 35,012 31,206 112,193 104,694 169,594 154,418
